name: Find differences (itch)
description:
Attentiveness - is an important ability for every of us. Some people have it on a high level from birth! Though, that, who feels that important details often fall out of sight, don't need to get upset. Attentiveness is can be and need to be developed - and find ways to do that - is not a problem. Because for present day have been so many fascinating and colorful games already. We are offering you to play a game "Find differences", this game's enjoyed as by children, as by adult.

In the game:

  • Find differences;
  • 50 levels with differences;
  • Funny and colorful pictures;
  • Ability to use hints;
  • Timer;
  • Pleasing music.

In a game "Find differences" you have to pass 50 fascinating levels. In every level you have to attentive glance on two pictures, on first sight they might seem the same, but there are some little differences between them. Player has to find 10 differences, such as different colours or missing objects between images. Find the differences you need as quickly as possible to get the maximum number of stars. If there are difficulties, then you can use the hint. Also, if you need to distract from the game, you can press pause button and the time will stop.

If you like interesting games, so let's find differences in this game too. Such game relys to the logic games' category, it forms thinking skills, develops eye memory, attention and logic.
